game.name: DigScape
game.genres: 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.shortDescription: Build, mine, and manage your own industrial zone in this relaxing 3D simulation game. Plan production, automate systems, and expand your operations step by step as you create a thriving environment.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build, mine, and manage your own industrial zone in this relaxing 3D simulation game. Plan production, automate systems, and expand your operations step by step as you create a thriving environment.
